#summary Installing the plugin on different OS'es

= Introduction =
Installing the plugin is quite simple. We provide an automatic installer which should work in most cases. However should this not succeed you can always install it manually.


= Automatic =
==Linux/OSX==
Download the following shell script [http://dl.decisionrepository.com/odr-plugin-installer.sh .sh script]
Make it executable using _chmod +x odr-plugin-installer.sh_
Run it _./odr-plugin-installer.sh_
